backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing blog storage, siteLive maintenance mode, email management, and admin-role access control with allowâ€‘list bootstrapping.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting the old Boolean siteLive field to an optional Bool for upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files used for build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide covering local and mainnet builds, maintenance mode operation, and domain configuration steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading Vite bundle and defining initial page metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application configuring routes, theming, query client, and maintenance gating for public pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin routes by checking Internet Identity authentication and admin status, showing login, denial, or children accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for login state and errors.
frontend/src/components/forms/StudentEnq: Collects student enquiry details, validates required fields, and after submission shows a summary with contact action links.
frontend/src/components/forms/TeacherEnq: Collects teacher application details with multi-select fields and shows a summary with contact links after submission.
frontend/src/components/maintenance/Main: Displays a maintenance mode message with optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/maintenance/Site: Blocks public access when the site is not live, showing maintenance or error states while allowing admin routes through.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Simple contact form with validation, simulated submission, and a post-submit confirmation screen.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: Renders the marketing footer with brand info, quick links, contact options, and logo handling logic.
Implements a responsive header with navigation links, mobile menu toggle, and logo display.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: Provides a contact section with WhatsApp, call, SMS, and email actions using site contact data.
Displays an accordion-based FAQ list sourced from site content.
Shows the main hero banner with headline, CTA buttons, feature highlights, and a hero image.
Outlines four steps of the service process using icon cards.
Lists tutoring service categories with icons and descriptions.
Displays testimonial cards with ratings, quotes, and author details.
Displays three trust metrics (experience, students, teachers) using cards and icons in a marketing section.
Renders a grid of value propositions with icons and descriptions explaining key benefits of the service.
frontend/src/config/publicDomain.ts: Provides utilities to determine the public domain and construct fully qualified URLs for assets and links.
frontend/src/config/siteConfig.ts: Defines the site name and helpers for generating page titles and retrieving branding info.
frontend/src/content/legalContent.ts: Exports structured Terms & Conditions content using the site name dynamically.
frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts: Contains marketing copy for hero, value props, services, steps, and testimonials using the site name.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Provides contact info, form options, trust stats, testimonials, and FAQs for the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on user identity, handling authentication and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomCursor.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identities, and status states.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Hook that sets the page title and meta description in the document head.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for blog CRUD operations, user profile access, and admin checks via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining global styles, color variables, dark mode, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Utilities to generate WhatsApp, SMS, email, and Gmail compose links with prefilled messages for students and teachers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBlogsPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing blog posts, including creation, editing, publishing, and deletion with UI dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSetupPage.tsx: Admin setup page enabling identity-based bootstrap, email setup, and admin status verification.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with loading states, fallback handling, and metadata updates.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists all published blogs with previews, loading skeletons, and navigation to full posts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows multiple contact methods with buttons for WhatsApp, phone, SMS, and email actions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage composing marketing sections and setting basic metadata.
Standalone marketing landing page with manual metadata setup and marketing sections.
frontend/src/pages/SetupChecklistPage.ts: Interactive setup checklist detailing configuration items like domain, logo, and contacts.
frontend/src/pages/StudentFormPage.tsx: Renders the student enquiry form with metadata and simple layout.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherFormPage.tsx: Renders the teacher registration form with metadata and descriptive intro.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays legal terms and conditions sourced from structured content.
frontend/src/types/backend-augment.d.ts: Augments the backend interface with an internal admin initialization method.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/static/growwithtutor-standalone: HTML for the standalone GrowWithTutor landing page, including domain config, dynamic logo loading, and navigation structure.
Explains the standalone GrowWithTutor landing page files and how to run them via direct file opening or a local server.
Contains structured content data used to populate text, sections, and UI elements on the standalone landing page.
Defines all styling for the standalone landing page, including layout, colors, typography, and responsive behavior.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme options, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, features, and pending requests related to domain changes and maintenance mode.
